head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HAYES, JOHN F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HAYES, JOHN F.

block.p: HAYES-John F. (Retired Justice of the NYS Supreme Court and 13th Borough President of Brooklyn). On January 3, 2001. Beloved husband of Margaret (nee Sullivan). Loving father of Margaret Baron, Mary Hayes-Conaty, John, Anne Allison, Elizabeth Reilly, Mark, Jude and the late Loretta. Devoted father-in-law of Richard, Clare, William, Michael, Rich, Gabrielle and Moira. Dearest brother-in-law of Anne Sullivan O.S.U. Cherished grandfather of Meghanne, Devon, Cara, Courtney, Michael, William, John, Rory, Morgan, Elizabeth, Liam and Isabelle. Funeral Monday 10:15AM from the McManus Funeral Home, 2001 Flatbush Ave, Brooklyn. Funeral Mass 11AM, St. Vincent Ferrer Church. Interment in Holy Cross Cemetery. Visiting Saturday and Sunday 2-5, 7-9PM.
